Package it.polimi.ingsw.Network.ClientSide

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.ClientSide.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkObserver, ViewObserver
public class ClientController extends Object implements ViewObserver, NetworkObserver
Observe the ClientListener and the view.

      ClientController constructor for the CLI.
      Parameters:
      view - it's the CLI.
      client - identifies the client at network layer.
      cliDrawer - drawer that handles the graphical part of the CLI.

  • Method Details

    • onUsername

      public void onUsername(String username)
      Sends the server a message containing the username chosen by the client, it still has to be checked by the server if it's an available nickname or not.
      Specified by:
      onUsername in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      username - chosen by the player.

    • onGamePreferences

      public void onGamePreferences(int numPlayers, Boolean expertMode)
      Sends the server a message containing the game preferences chosen by the client. They are first checked by the CLI itself in order to prevent the entry of lexically uncorrected data, or not acceptable values. Then they are checked by the server and if all is correct then the player will be added to a new or an already existing game.
      Specified by:
      onGamePreferences in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the player wants to play with.
      expertMode - true if the player decides to play in expert mode, else false.

    • onLogout

      public void onLogout()
      Sends the server a service message notifying that the player wants to log out and then disconnects him.
      Specified by:
      onLogout in interface ViewObserver

    • onColorChoice

      public void onColorChoice(int color)
      Sends the server a message containing the color he chose.
      Specified by:
      onColorChoice in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      color - the player chose.

    • onStudentMovement_toIsle

      public void onStudentMovement_toIsle(int isleId)
      Sends the server a message containing the ID of the isle where he wants to place the previously selected student.
      Specified by:
      onStudentMovement_toIsle in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      isleId - of the isle chosen.

    • onStudentMovement_toDining

      public void onStudentMovement_toDining()
      Sends the server a message containing a non-relevant generic value (this is because it isn't required any other value in order to move a student to the dining).
      Specified by:
      onStudentMovement_toDining in interface ViewObserver

      Parameters:

    • onAtomicEffect

      public void onAtomicEffect(int genericValue)
      Sends the server a message containing the value useful in order to activate the effect of the character card played.
      Specified by:
      onAtomicEffect in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      genericValue - assumes different meaning based on the character card played (it can be a color or an isleID)

    • onMNMovement

      public void onMNMovement(int idIsle)
      Sends the server a message containing the ID of the isle where the player wants to move mother nature.
      Specified by:
      onMNMovement in interface ViewObserver
      Parameters:
      idIsle - ID of the chosen isle.

      idCloud - ID of the chosen cloud.

    • onEndCharacterPhase

      public void onEndCharacterPhase()
      Sends the server a message containing a non-relevant generic value (this is because it isn't required any other value in order to notify the end of the character card phase).
      Specified by:
      onEndCharacterPhase in interface ViewObserver

    • update

      public void update(NetworkMessage message)
      Updates the view relying on the messageType of the message received from the server.

      Parameters:
